title: Script leveling accounts in bots
body:
Hi just wanted to know does the ingame report option actually do something to the bot leveling accounts? I just write "script leveling account" put cheating and move on
Been leveling a new account and i see them so frequently, had 2 in 1 game just today. 
They take any champ jhin/kayne  with smite etc and go from jg camp to jg camp, sitting at each for like 1 min then moving around.

replies.body: There are systems that will detect and remove bots or exploits, but your reports can help our teams prioritize who we're looking at.  Hit that report button so we can take action!
They are more common in low level games, as new accounts are free to make. Most of them get caught and banned as a result of player reports before they make it to ranked games and other modes.
